name: Experience: Lost Memory
desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than 50% for the first time in this battle, there's a 70% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).
enhanced_desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than 50% for the first time in this battle, there's a 100% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).
